channel.title: Shop Problem
channel.description:
I have a shop to buy certificates. I am wanting to use certificates as max cash, like if you have a stack of max cash and want more money, buy a certificate for max cash, and use that. I put certificates in my shop. There are 1000M (1 bill) certificates in my shop, but they cost 1 coin. How do I make them cost max cash? Please help. Thanks
EXTRA INFO: Source: Allstar Prevision: 317
